title: KABK TypeMedia 13/14 graduation work
content:
As seen on other networks: Our graduation work is finally up:  
 [http://typemedia2014.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415110037/http:/typemedia2014.com/ "http://typemedia2014.com/")
author: nina

comments.content:
Apparently the discussion is happening here:  
 [http://typophile.com/node/117917](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415110037/http:/typophile.com/node/117917 "http://typophile.com/node/117917")
Great work, Nina! I love how you’ve used rigorous design and beautiful drawing to research a theoretical premise. Now I will go post in the other thread…
